title: New guidance offered for responsible AI use in health care
description: Hundreds of health care artificial intelligence (AI) tools have been cleared by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA), yet only a fraction are rigorously evaluated for clinical impact, fairness or bias. Furthermore, the FDA review only covers a small portion of health AI tools being developed and used in health care. The American Heart Association (Association), a global force changing the future of health for all, today released a new science advisory urging health systems to adopt clear and simple rules for using AI in patient care.
content: Hundreds of health care artificial intelligence (AI) tools have been cleared by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA), yet only a fraction are rigorously evaluated for clinical impact, fairness or bias. Furthermore, the FDA review only covers a... [3394 chars]

title: India's Strategic Leap in AI and Data Centers
description: Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal chaired a meeting targeting the enhancement of ease of doing business in the data center and artificial intelligence sectors. The meeting emphasized fortifying policy frameworks and digital infrastructure to attract investments in future technologies, capitalizing on India's growing data center market.
content:
The Commerce and Industry Ministry, led by Minister Piyush Goyal, held a significant meeting focusing on the data center and artificial intelligence sectors' ease of doing business.
Discussions zeroed in on advancing the policy environment, refining ... [473 chars]

title: Multilateral digital payment systems to expand in next decade: Ravi Menon
description: Financial technology has changed the way we think about money. In the past decade, it pushed for new ways to pay, bank and invest. Now, the focus is on using artificial intelligence and tokenisation to innovate. As the Singapore Fintech Festival celebrates its 10th year, Sarah Al-Khaldi sits down with Ravi Menon - Chai

title: Toronto region police unit turns to AI to help answer calls
description: The Halton Regional Police Service has launched an artificial intelligence call processing system designed to handle non-emergency phone calls.
content:
The Halton Regional Police Service has launched an artificial intelligence call processing system designed to handle non-emergency phone calls.

title: AI revolution faces power challenges
description: SAN FRANCISCO — In the race for artificial intelligence (AI) dominance, American tech giants have the money and the chips, but their ambitions have hit a new obstacle: electric power.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO — In the race for artificial intelligence (AI) dominance, American tech giants have the money and the chips, but their ambitions have hit a new obstacle: electric power.

title: Scientists call on Von der Leyen to withdraw AI comment
description: More than 70 AI scientists from around the world have written to European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen asking her to retract a statement she made in May that artificial intelligence is expected to approach human reasoning "next year".
content:
More than 70 AI scientists from around the world have written to European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen asking her to retract a statement she made in May that artificial intelligence is expected to approach human reasoning "next year".

title: Supreme Court's Monday Agenda: From AI Concerns to Women's Reservation
description: The Supreme Court of India tackled multiple high-profile cases on Monday, ranging from a road accident inquiry in Rajasthan to concerns over artificial intelligence, electoral issues in Tamil Nadu, and women's reservation under the Nari Shakti Vandan Act. Other notable mentions included cases on political defection, contempt against judges, and the dismissal of an actress's plea.
content:
The Supreme Court of India was at the epicenter of several critical legal discussions on Monday, addressing a broad spectrum of cases that highlight both state and national concerns.
Among the day's topics, the court sought responses regarding a trag... [394 chars]

title: RUNSTACK Unveils Hypergraph Long-Term Memory for Agentic Systems
description: NORTH YORK, Ontario, Nov. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- RUNSTACK Inc., a Canadian AI agent software company, today announced a breakthrough in artificial intelligence: HyperMemory, a proprietary long-term memory architecture built on advanced hypergraph technology. This innovation fundamentally solves the 'forgetting' problem that plagues current AI systems, transforming AI agent memory from fuzzy memory into reliable, long-term memory that is dynamically updating and can be shared between AI agents.

title: Nvidia and other tech stocks help Wall Street recover
description: Big Tech is rallying as Wall Street recovers much of its loss from last week. Nvidia led the way. It and other winners in the frenzy around artificial-intelligence technology had been at the center of last week’s drop.
content:
By STAN CHOE, Associated Press Business Writer
NEW YORK (AP) — Big Tech and other superstars of the U.S. stock market are rallying on Monday, as Wall Street recovers much of its loss from last week.
